meanings.definition: A part of a check, receipt, or ticket that is torn off and kept as a record
meanings.sent1: I tore off the counterfoils from the tickets to keep as proof of purchase.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to retain the counterfoils from your checks for your records.
meanings.sent3: The counterfoils from the receipts were like little souvenirs of my shopping spree.
meanings.sent4: The counterfoils acted as tiny memory capsules of each transaction.
meanings.sent5: The counterfoils were like mini diaries of my expenses.
